instruction: Compose a song in the key of B minor.
output:
Verse: 
Bm          C          G
It’s like the world around us fades into gray
A          Bm         G
As endless darkness seeps into our days
Chorus:
D            Bm        G
The beauty of life still sparkles and shines
A            Bm        G
Hope blooms in our hearts, just like a vine
Bridge: 
G         Bm          A
We’ll keep going and never forget
Bm         G           D
The beauty of life, we’ll never regret
Outro:
Bm          A           D
Our will to keep going will never cease
G          Bm       D
The beauty of life won’t ever release
